instruction: Generate a list of characteristics of a computer.
output:
1. Processing Power – The ability to quickly process and execute instructions to complete tasks.
2. Memory – The ability to store information and data that can be accessed quickly. 
3. Storage – The ability to store and retain large amounts of data permanently.
4. Operating System – Software that controls the basic hardware and software components of a computer.
5. Input and Output devices – Keyboard, mouse, scanner, printer, etc.
6. Network Connectivity – Ability to connect to external devices and networks. 
7. Video Card – An add-on component used to output graphics to a display.
8. Audio Card – An add-on component used to output audio signals.
